venue.name: Boston Beer Works ( near North Station)

item.description:
Love hockey or simply appreciate hockey fans? C'mon out!! We'll meet from 5:00-7:30pm in the North Station area. Stop by whenever possible within this window. We will be upstairs at BOSTON BEERWORKS. (I appreciate the commented-on and emailed-in votes!)

p.s. You do not need to have tickets to the game to attend this meeting, in fact I don't have tickets myself.
p.p.s. There is a Bruins' Pub Crawl going on at the same time in the area. I've gone on their last 2 crawls so I can tell you from experience the place will be crawling with hockey fans of all ages, though mostly beer-guzzling males. WARNING: Not a good idea to drive in for this one. I highly recommend public transportation!!! Don't say I didn't warn you...
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs near the pool tables in a Whaler's Hockey Jersey #44 [White background w/blue & green lettering]
item.name: Bruins vs Sabres Pre-Party
